page.title: 14THROCKLEY.(2)
page.content: {A dentist's}- people have their teeth checked and treated. {A Post Office}- where stamps can be purchased for sending letters. {A Take-away food shop}- hot food can be bought and taken out. {Foodshops}- for buying groceries. {A park}- for children to play and have picnics {A newsagents}- that sells newspapers and magazines {'Hadrian House'}- a home for old people. {A Bingo Hall}- where bingo is played. {Churches}- there are three of these. {Fish and chip shop}- this is very popular especially with children. {A wool shop}- many mothers buy wool here to knit their children jumpers. {Bus Routes}- through Throckley to Heddon on the Wall, Carlisle and Newcastle.
